title: Third Point Builds Indra Stake, Urges Board to Pursue M&A
description: Third Point LLC has taken a stake in Spanish technology and defense company Indra Sistemas SA and is throwing its support behind Chairman Ángel Escribano’s plan to buy a smaller rival.
